item.description: This year we are in charge of the food tent at the town's event. We will be serving burgers, hotdogs, drinks and even ice cream. We'll have a couple of substations within our booth for those just getting beverages or ice cream. Please be sure to let us know when you are available to help, so we can plan accordingly. We'll need 12 people in tent at all times to keep it running smoothly. For more, please contact Paul at PaulPSWJC@aol.com.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have the massive line of hungry people
item.name: Armed Forces Day Food Tent
